content.html: Or you can stop forcing people back to spaces where they don’t feel comfortable and instead let them do their jobs from home like they’ve been able to do for the past 2 years. This obsession with getting back to pre-pandemic “normality” is so weird. It wasn’t that great before.
content.value:
Or you can stop forcing people back to spaces where they don’t feel comfortable and instead let them do their jobs from home like they’ve been able to do for the past 2 years.

This obsession with getting back to pre-pandemic “normality” is so weird.

It wasn’t that great before.
